meanings.definition: To install new wiring in (a building, machine, etc.)
meanings.sent1: Dad rewires the old house for safety.
meanings.sent2: The electrician rewires the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat rewires the holiday lights for a twinkling surprise.
meanings.sent4: Learning a new language rewires your brain for new connections.
meanings.sent5: The storm rewires the power lines, causing a blackout in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To reorganize or restructure (something) by changing its wiring or connections.
meanings.sent1: She rewires her study schedule for better productivity.
meanings.sent2: The IT team rewires the network to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The chef rewires the recipe, adding a fun twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Traveling to new places rewires your perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: A breakup rewires your emotions, leading to self-reflection.
